name: Seed Store 4IC
description:
Solve problems as a helper bot in this puzzler.

Arrow keys/WASD: move
X: Push
Z: Undo
R: Reset level

Color theme: https://lospec.com/palette-list/nature-10

NOTE: This game is mostly complete. I'm not particularly happy with the final level and may come back to it, but it is what it is. Due to how the puzzlescript rules are implemented, sound effects are limited (sorry lasers don't make noises) and occasionally wonky (sliding into something that doesn't move makes on extra sound).
